code: import"./Header.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const onLogoutClick=()=>{console.log('--clicked log out--');alert('Log out');};const getLogoSrc=()=>{let storeFolder='';if(location.href.indexOf('www.amuzely.com')==-1&&location.href.indexOf('.amuzely.com')!=-1){const storeFolder=location.href.substring(location.href.indexOf('https://')+'https://'.length,location.href.indexOf('.amuzely.com'));}else{storeFolder='../../app/swirlyojpnagar/images/logo.png';}return"../../app/".concat(storeFolder,"/images/logo.png");};const Header=props=>{const logoSrc=getLogoSrc();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header",children:["",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"store-logo",src:logoSrc}),props.loggedOut&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{id:"logout",className:"logout",onClick:onLogoutClick,children:"Logout"})]});};export default Header;
